features.title: Manage Booking Widget
features.description: Enable users to perform various travel-related tasks directly from the homepage using a comprehensive, tab-based widget.
features.businessValue: Streamlined user experience leading to increased customer satisfaction and reduced support calls
acceptanceCriteria: Widget displays multiple tabs for different booking functions
Manage booking tab allows booking retrieval
Error handling for invalid booking references
